experience.description: Developed and deployed multiple production-level AI/ML models during internship at CTTC, focusing on real-world problem-solving and model optimization.
Worked on Java-based application development at Glucian Pvt. Ltd., contributing to backend logic, code optimization, and feature implementation for production systems.

projects.name: Amazon Clone Web App
projects.description: Built a full-stack Amazon clone web application with user authentication, product listings, cart functionality, and payment integration, simulating real-time e-commerce workflows.
